After spending a few days in San Sebastian, then traveling to Barcelona, Sagardi was a pleasant reminder of the delicious pintxo bars of the Basque Country.  We had just finished a bicycle tour through Fat Tire and had out run a rain storm when our guide took us to this tasty spot.  If you are not familiar with pintxos bars, they are self serve.  You request a plate from the bartender and choose from the array of treats situated across the bar.  Nothing is labeled, but if you ask the bartenders, they speak English well enough to explain what each one is.  Otherwise, just enjoy the gastronomic adventure.  Each pintxos has a tooth pick through it so that the bartender can tally up your bill.  As previous reviewers have noted, it's standing room only inside, but they do have seats outside for a higher price.   It's definitely a fun place and with some interesting bites.
